descriptionHtml:
Cute Lydia Replacer


------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Another mod made from presets of my chars
Just a little remodelling of our cute housecarl
This is a replacer only - no stats or data of vanilla Lydia haven`t been changed



------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Please copy and overwrite in Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNLydia.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod


As usual cosmetic mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701



All cheers and credits go to the modders whose mods I`ve used


If you meet any bugs please report


------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, just give me credit.
Thank  Bethesda for great game


Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
